predicate.note: Frames file for 'muddy' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: His `` Mr. Clean '' image was muddied [*-1] by an arms-kickback scandal , which [*T*-2] will be a major campaign issue .
